WASTE.Definition: an unnecessary or wrong use of time, money, energy etc

DEADLINES.Definition: a time or day by which something must be done

ASSIGNMENTS.Definition: a piece of work that is given to someone as part of their job

NONSENSE.Definition: foolish or meaningless words, ideas, or actions

RENOVATION.Definition: to repair and improve something, especially a building

OUTDATED.Definition: old-fashioned; no longer useful or relevant to modern life

UPDATED.Definition: to make something more modern by changing its design

FIXTURES.Definition: a permanently fixed piece of furniture in a house, such as a bath

RECEIVE.Definition: to get or be given something

EMPHASIS.Definition: the particular importance or attention that is given to something

SWITCH.Definition: exchange by replacing one thing with another

FROM TIME TO TIME.Definition: sometimes, but not regularly or very often
